import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Footer from '../Footer' import Navbar from '../Navbar' const Shipping = () => { const cart_items = useSelector(state=> state.cart.cart_items) return ( <>
{ cart_items && cart_items.map((item, i)=> { return }) } {/* */}
S.No. Prodct Image Product Name Unit Price Quantity Total Price Action

Proceed to Checkout.

) } export default Shipping
